sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnmtginfo ( MTG_ID /* */ , MTG_NM /* */ , MTG_MTR_CN /* */ , MTG_SN /* */ , MTG_CO /* */ , MTG_DE /* */ , MTG_PLACE /* */ , MTG_BEGIN_TM /* */ , MTG_END_TM /* */ , CLSDR_MTG_AT /* */ , READNG_BGNDE /* */ , READNG_AT /* */ , MTG_RESULT_CN /* */ , MTG_RESULT_ENNC /* */ , ETC_MATTER /* */ , MNGT_DEPT_ID /* */ , MNAER_ID /* */ , MNAER_DEPT_ID /* */ , MTG_AT /* */ , NONATDRN_CO /* */ , ATDRN_CO /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #mtgId# /* */ , #mtgNm# /* */ , #mtgMtrCn# /* */ , #mtgSn# /* */ , #mtgCo# /* */ , #mtgDe# /* */ , #mtgPlace# /* */ , #mtgBeginTm# /* */ , #mtgEndTm# /* */ , #clsdrMtgAt# /* */ , #readngBgnde# /* */ , #readngAt# /* */ , #mtgResultCn# /* */ , #mtgResultEnnc# /* */ , #etcMatter# /* */ , #mngtDeptId# /* */ , #mnaerId# /* */ , #mnaerDeptId# /* */ , #mtgAt# /* */ , #nonatdrnCo# /* */ , #atdrnCo# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnmtginfo SET MTG_ID=#mtgId# /* */ , MTG_NM=#mtgNm# /* */ , MTG_MTR_CN=#mtgMtrCn# /* */ , MTG_SN=#mtgSn# /* */ , MTG_CO=#mtgCo# /* */ , MTG_DE=#mtgDe# /* */ , MTG_PLACE=#mtgPlace# /* */ , MTG_BEGIN_TM=#mtgBeginTm# /* */ , MTG_END_TM=#mtgEndTm# /* */ , CLSDR_MTG_AT=#clsdrMtgAt# /* */ , READNG_BGNDE=#readngBgnde# /* */ , READNG_AT=#readngAt# /* */ , MTG_RESULT_CN=#mtgResultCn# /* */ , MTG_RESULT_ENNC=#mtgResultEnnc# /* */ , ETC_MATTER=#etcMatter# /* */ , MNGT_DEPT_ID=#mngtDeptId# /* */ , MNAER_ID=#mnaerId# /* */ , MNAER_DEPT_ID=#mnaerDeptId# /* */ , MTG_AT=#mtgAt# /* */ , NONATDRN_CO=#nonatdrnCo# /* */ , ATDRN_CO=#atdrnCo# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ WHERE MTG_ID=#mtgId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT MTG_ID /* */ , MTG_NM /* */ , MTG_MTR_CN /* */ , MTG_SN /* */ , MTG_CO /* */ , MTG_DE /* */ , MTG_PLACE /* */ , MTG_BEGIN_TM /* */ , MTG_END_TM /* */ , CLSDR_MTG_AT /* */ , READNG_BGNDE /* */ , READNG_AT /* */ , MTG_RESULT_CN /* */ , MTG_RESULT_ENNC /* */ , ETC_MATTER /* */ , MNGT_DEPT_ID /* */ , MNAER_ID /* */ , MNAER_DEPT_ID /* */ , MTG_AT /* */ , NONATDRN_CO /* */ , ATDRN_CO /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtnmtginfo WHERE MTG_ID=#mtgId# /* */

SELECT MTG_ID /* */ , MTG_NM /* */ , MTG_MTR_CN /* */ , MTG_SN /* */ , MTG_CO /* */ , MTG_DE /* */ , MTG_PLACE /* */ , MTG_BEGIN_TM /* */ , MTG_END_TM /* */ , CLSDR_MTG_AT /* */ , READNG_BGNDE /* */ , READNG_AT /* */ , MTG_RESULT_CN /* */ , MTG_RESULT_ENNC /* */ , ETC_MATTER /* */ , MNGT_DEPT_ID /* */ , MNAER_ID /* */ , MNAER_DEPT_ID /* */ , MTG_AT /* */ , NONATDRN_CO /* */ , ATDRN_CO /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ FROM comtnmtginfo WHERE 1=1
MTG_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
MTG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY MTG_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnmtginfo WHERE 1=1
MTG_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
MTG_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
